entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
